Any way, I've been generous ( over 2.5 ratio)

I personally wasn't impressed  about the movie-I found it childish then I read some comments written by soldiers from Iraq:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0887912/usercomments?filter=hate
The Hurt Locker - Academy Award, Best Picture 2009
